about_the_game:
Neverseas is an open-world sandbox action RPG from a third-person perspective. The game takes place in the era of graceful sailing ships and pirate romance, and you are invited to try yourself in the role of a real captain of a sailing ship. Here you have to manage a team, monitor the condition of ships, improve and modernize them, and you must also not forget about individual equipment, because on land you will not have access to the capabilities of your ship to protect you..



In an era when the British Empire reached the peak of its maritime greatness, and pirates turned from the main scourge of the seas into breathtaking fairy tales for youngsters, a legend was born in dark port taverns, under the clink of glasses and a river of ale. It talks about the Unprecedented seas, no one knows where they are, what is there and how to get there.



Legends and tales of past years, which everyone thought were fairy tales and bedtime stories for children, mixed with reality. Travelers were presented with exciting spectacles, while lurking dangers, for which there was no explanation, awaited at every turn. Everyone who returned were so frightened and lost that they bid farewell to sanity and are now outcasts, entertaining guests with tales of it over a bowl of stew and a tankard of ale.

    Setting and plot

    The game is an openworld pirate sandbox, which can change dynamically. Passing by an island you passed, returning in a couple of hours, you might return to find empty waves there, a naval battle taking place, or another island altogether. Your main goal is to preserve the ship. If you lose a land battle, your loyal comrades will pull you out of trouble, but losing the ship means you're gone forever. Nothing in the Neverseas goes unnoticed, and a mysterious force doesn't want to let you go, so even if you lose the ship, you'll start anew on the same island where you first woke up and can begin everything again.

  • Manage

    A schooner, a frigate or a warship are all complex mechanisms, the control of which is possible only with the coordinated actions of the entire team. Just as in a watch, the failure of one gear will lead to the collapse of the entire mechanism, and if the sails are set ineptly, the ship will inevitably crash on the rocks. Command wisely, manage your resources skillfully and only then will you become a thunderstorm of the seas.



  • Explore

    The world of Neverseas is filled with many secrets and riddles, by solving which you receive answers - the keys to understanding the world order and awareness of the events around you. The world is not static; it changes from your direct and indirect actions, leading to the most unexpected, surprising, and sometimes frightening events..

  • Fight!

    It is not surprising that you are not the only one seeking fame and fortune. There are many captains trying to gain glory in the murky waters of Neverseas, and they are clearly not in the mood to make concessions to you



  • Upgrade

    Both your equipment and the ship’s weapons require careful care and modernization. Look for blueprints, learn recipes, negotiate with artisans, create a unique look for your ship that suits your style.

Good luck in your adventures Captain

content_descriptors.notes: Black humor in dialogues, pirate battles on ships, remnants of the past (skeletons on maps), melee and gunfire battles with blood particles.

detailed_description:
Early Demo Access



Please note, that this is early demo and a lot of stuff is gonna change.
As we continue working on the project, some things may work not properly, translations might be missing, some bugs can follow you.
Please be patient and if you have any questions don't hesitate to reach us out in discord, as we'd be happy to help you enjoy our game and so we could solve issues for you or include fixes in updates to come.

Demo contents:
In the demo version, you can expect naval battles, an endless open world full of treasures waiting to find their way into the holds of lucky adventurers, sword duels, random quests that can be obtained at outposts and settlements, trading, piracy, raids, as well as the beginning of your adventure and your story in the world of Neverseas, where everything will depend on you and your crew on how it all unfolds.

Recommended graphics settings:
If you are an owner of RTX2060 or analog, its recommended to use medium settings and Full HD resolution for ~50-60 FPS.
For graphic cards with lower parameters we had no oportunities for real testing and if you'd share your results with us in the discord or steam discussions that would be much appreciated.

short_description: Ahoy, captain! Welcome and join us to find out the untold tale of Neverseas, where time and space is a dream and you are a sand grain in an endless lost sea that careless wanderer can fall into. The main question is are you brave enough to dive into it?
